front.title: A GSS-API Mechanism for the Extensible Authentication Protocol

abstract.t: This document defines protocols, procedures, and conventions to be employed by peers implementing the Generic Security Service Application Program Interface (GSS-API) when using the EAP mechanism. Through the GS2 family of mechanisms, these protocols also define how Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL, RFC 4422) applications use the Extensible Authentication Protocol.
